snippet.title: Him, the Smile & bloom | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Refreshingly adult Otome that charts the lives of four couples - centered around a local flower shop. ‘Him, the Smile & bloom’ is a mature exploration of the flourishing relationship between two adults and the highs and lows of their budding romance. With twelve endings to enjoy, it is sure to make both your heart melt and your pulse race.

Coming Q1 2025.

Wishlist Now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/3197720/Him_the_Smile__bloom/ 

Follow PQube Games on social media!
